description: Naylor's Blue Leyland Cypress is an amazing evergreen tree that is sure to bring your garden to life. It has a lovely, grey-blue foliage, along with a columnar shape that is perfect for a wide variety of gardens. Not only does it look great all year round, but it does well in both full sun and partial shade, making it a hardy addition to any landscape. It is highly tolerant of different soils, and grows rapidly into a densely structured and deep green hedge that provides excellent screening and windbreaks. With their strong aromatic fragrance, the Naylor's Blue Leyland Cypress is the perfect choice for an amazing garden tree.
